name: Spectrum
description:
Generate beautiful color palettes and apply instantly to illustrations, images, interfaces, literally anything on the canvas with one click!


Working with colors has never been this easy

Break out of the trial-error loop and instantly see how color palettes come alive on your design!


Create and iterate effortlessly

Building a color system, designing complex vector art, or making UI flows- supercharge your workflow from hours to seconds!


Pay once, love forever

You get 5 free trials per account. Get an unlimited license including all future updates -> https://colorspectrum.design/index.html#plans


------------------------------------------------------------


Spectrum also has a free web generator and more cool stuff. Check out -> https://colorspectrum.design/


If you've any questions, feedback, feature requests, or need a student license, reach out to me over Twitter -> https://twitter.com/millons098 or drop a mail at -> colorspectrum.design@gmail.com
